Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Aparthotel Mariano Cubi Barcelona places you in the heart of Barcelona, walking distance from Pilar Clinic and Foto Colectania Foundation. This 4-star aparthotel is close to Casa Batllo and Sagrada Familia.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 67 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the aparthotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Barcelona? This aparthotel has facilities measuring 753 square feet (70 square meters), including a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the aparthotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in the lobby.
Make yourself at home in one of the 67 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

A stay at Aparthotel Mariano Cubi Barcelona places you in the heart of Barcelona, walking distance from Pilar Clinic and Foto Colectania Foundation. This 4-star aparthotel is close to Casa Batllo and Sagrada Familia.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Pilar Clinic - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Foto Colectania Foundation - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Casa Vicens - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Francesc Macia Plaza - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Teatreneu - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Baro de Quadras Palace - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Fundacio Sunol - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Hospital Clinic - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Casa Mila - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Fundacio Joan Brossa - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Montaner Palace - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Bulevard Rosa - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Barcelona Egyptian Museum - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Teresian College of Barcelona - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Fundacio Antoni Tapies - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Mariano Cubi Barcelona is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Mariano Cubi is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Barcelona Tourist Tax applies, to be paid directly to the hotel upon check-in. Guests under the age of 16 are exempt. Tax rates apply per person, per night, for a maximum 7 nights, as follows: 5-star EUR 2.48; 4-star EUR 1.21; 1 to 3-star EUR 0.72. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Room 1
Check in time: 2pmCheck out time: 12pm
Notice
The Catalan government applies a tax regulation for hotel stays in Catalonia. The charges are per person (age 17 and over) per night (up to 7 nights stay) and are applicable by the following scheme: Catalonia: 5* hotel Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 2.48 VAT included 4* hotel Barcelona City 1.21 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Apartments – holiday homes – tourist accommodation Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Rest of accommodation types Barcelona City 0.72 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.50 VAT included. Tax is payable directly at the hotel upon arrival.

The charges are per person (age 17 and over) per night (up to 7 nights stay) and are applicable by the following scheme: Catalonia: 5* hotel Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 2.48 VAT included 4* hotel Barcelona City 1.21 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Apartments – holiday homes – tourist accommodation Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Rest of accommodation types Barcelona City 0.72 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.50 VAT included. Tax is payable directly at the hotel upon arrival.
